title: Ékleipsis
description:
NABE Pinnacle Award Winner for Horror.
 
Winner of Literary Titan Gold Award.
 
Reader Views Bronze Award for Short Stories
 The sun has finally set on humanity… What happens when we give in to the darkness? Ékleipsis is a short story collection that explores the havoc wreaked when ordinary people abandon their humanity to pursue their darkest desires, and questions just how far people will go to follow their baser instincts.Each story takes a version of a person we've known in our own lives and transforms them into something completely unnerving—yet all too familiar.These dark, complex characters and twisted tales of the once ordinary will change your perception of humanity forever.
author: Tamel Wino
